name: Plex Media Server
description: Checks Plex Media Server status and restarts it if not running.
check_cmd: systemctl is-active plexmediaserver || service plexmediaserver status | grep -q 'active (running)' && echo active || echo inactive
fix_cmd: systemctl restart plexmediaserver || service plexmediaserver restart
verify_cmd: systemctl is-active plexmediaserver || service plexmediaserver status | grep -q 'active (running)' && echo active || echo inactive
